name: places/ChIJEck-k2ZZwokRR-3xPLd9Xmw
adrFormatAddress: 555 12th Ave, New York, NY 10019, USA

editorialSummary.text: Center providing kayaks & stand-up paddleboards for rent, plus classes, tours & camps for kids.

originalText.text:
Great kayaking experience and very friendly staff!
As a somewhat experienced paddler, I joined a few of the guided trips proposed here, and had a lot of fun.
The staff is very professional and welcoming. I just had the great pleasure of paddling their legendary Manhattan circumnavigation trip, which was a remarkable experience (see some photos I took along the way)!

originalText.text: An amazing place right on the water in the Hudson River. Whether you're a visitor or a local, MKC warmly welcomes you and makes you feel like part of the team. It's fantastic for beginners who want to get acquainted with kayaking (private classes and guided trips are well-organized and available year-round), as well as for advanced/expert kayakers (exciting expeditions on the bay and around the island are simply thrilling, providing enjoyment of the activity, the stunning views, and the friendly bond with instructors and the rest of the team). Davis and Jay are wonderful, supportive, and helpful in fixing things to ensure your comfort. Suzy is excellent in responding to all your questions and arranging anything, including last-minute changes. If you get to know the owner, Eric, well... he is one of a kind and will give you important advice and share many great stories about kayaking. Some technical information: safety is their top priority; all equipment is regularly double-checked. Weather forecasts and sea/river conditions are always updated. Everything you need for your comfort is readily available in the storage. You only need to be prepared to have a lot of fun and create splendid memories.

originalText.text: A wonderful SUP Yoga experience with Mackenzie at the Manhattan Kayak. The ladder flow was progressive and class was well-paced to help build confidence towards peak balancing poses. Options were given to cater to the mutli-level class, and I was kept challenged and humbled. Lockers are provided (bring your own lock), life vests are provided, and expert photographer on board. Thank you for the amazing experience!!

originalText.text: Love the first twilight to dark experience! Guides were so friendly and took pics for us at no charge. It’s so surreal being on the Hudson at dusk when the water reflects the beautiful colors of the sunset sky and the city skylights come on. Booked my second tour and bringing my daughter this time. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience with Manhattan Kayak Co! So far I did the Sushi Trip and Palisades trip which were both fantastic! Looking forward to more kayaking adventures!
